description: The Prairie Poppy Mallow (Callirhoe Alceoides 'Logan Calhoun') is an absolutely stunning plant â€“ from its vibrant, deep purple petals to its tall, gray-green stems and leaves. Its foliage makes an eye-catching background for the bright flowers, making it the perfect addition to any garden. Not only is it attractive, but it's highly resilient to both hot and cold temperatures, making it a hardy plant to grow. This drought-tolerant plant comes into bloom late in the season, with a multitude of vibrant blooms that will last until the first frost. With its lovely combination of colors, shapes and textures, the Prairie Poppy Mallow is an amazing addition to any garden.
